name: Up: The Video Game
description:
Up: The Video Game is a family, action, arcade and platformer game developed by Asobo Studio and Heavy Iron Studios. It came out on 26-05-2009. It was published by THQ. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
Up: The Video Game is available on Wii, Nintendo DS, PSP and Xbox 360. The game is sold via Nintendo eShop and Xbox 360 Store.
It was scored by Chad Seiter and Michael Giacchino.
